attributes.action: We want the £28 Billion to be spent on the armed forces, tri services instead of tridents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want the prime minster and his goverment to rethink there spending on defence. You should use the £28 Billion pounds to rearm our soilders you have sent to fight. Give them better kit,better pay,better housing. With this money that you are going to wasted on WMD's& submarins your going to put them in. At this point in time you are cutting money to the troops. Why because the war you put them in, is costing the tresury to much. So take £28Billion over the next10/15yrs. Be far to these young men and woman that are putting there lives on the line.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/peace-not-war/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
